summary: The customer contacted Contoso Wireless to report a problem with their recently purchased TV, which was no longer working. The customer service agent apologized for the inconvenience and requested the serial number of the TV so they could take a closer look. After troubleshooting, the customer service agent offered to send out a replacement TV while they worked on fixing the original one, which should arrive within 2-3 business days. The customer was thankful for the help and there were no further inquiries.
